newsitem.title: USA: Reading & Bates in Gulf of Mexico exploration.
newsitem.headline: Reading & Bates in Gulf of Mexico exploration.

text.p: Reading & Bates Corp said Tuesday it agreed with Santa Fe Energy Resources Inc to explore five oil and natural gas prospects in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico in water depths ranging from 400 to 2,400 feet.

Santa Fe Energy will operate the properties for the partners and has contracted a rig to begin the drilling program in the Spring of 1997. Total Offshore Production Systems, a joint venture between Reading & Bates and Intec Inc, will carry out the design, construction and installation of facilities associated with commercial discoveries on the five prospects.
"This represents a significant advancement in our strategy to acquire equity in first class oil and gas prospects," Reading & Bates said in a statement that contained no details on the effort.
"We are very optimistic that the combination of Santa Fe's exploration expertise with TOPS' ability to rapidly develop the projects will produce excellent results for the parties."
